snippet: The reinsurance arm of Third Point, the hedge fund run by Daniel S. Loeb, opened at $12.25 a share, below its initial public offering price, before rebounding.
abstract: The reinsurance arm of Third Point, the hedge fund run by Daniel S. Loeb, opened at $12.25 a share, below its initial public offering price, before rebounding.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Third Point Reinsurance Climbs in First Day of Trading
